entry.title: Yellow Paper Daisy
entry.summary:
Author: Babysterek

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 46,878Chapters: 16/?Kudos: 110

Summary: “Well,” Peter says at last, forcing a crooked smile into his voice, “at least this time he didn’t almost get us all killed.”Derek swallows. His throat is dry, the words scraping on the way out. “I was drunk.” They land and disappear without effect. Talia turns then, her gaze settling on him fully. It’s steady, unreadable, and it makes his shoulders tense despite himself. “You were careless,” she says. “You are a werewolf, and if you got drunk, you laced it with wolfsbane, you did it. Do you understand, In twenty-four years, every scandal has had the same root. You. At some point, it stops being bad luck and becomes character. And I am tired of pretending this is something that merely happens to you.” --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Derek just wanted a moment of quiet. Instead, he crosses a line with the last person he should trust.....old grudges, bad decisions and a mistake he keeps repeating. "He learned the shape of the poison once, from a woman who wore it like skin. Now hemlock blooms in his own hands, and he cannot tell where she ends and he begins. "

entry.title: A Flower Made Of Iron
entry.summary:
Author: XOLissy

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,188,708Chapters: 38/?Kudos: 56

Summary: Eden Parker has learned how to survive by staying soft in a world that punishes it. Adopted young, raised in the quiet fractures of Mystic Falls, and carrying truths no one else can see, Eden moves through life balancing grief, loyalty, and a dangerous kind of hope. He loves deeply. He trusts carefully. And he has no idea how many forces—human and otherwise—are already watching him. When new friendships form, old wounds reopen, and the supernatural begins to bleed into the ordinary, Eden finds himself at the center of something far larger than a high-school existence should allow. Monsters lurk in forests and shadows. Love arrives when it shouldn’t. Protection becomes complicated. And the past—buried, sealed, and forgotten—refuses to stay quiet. Some bonds are chosen. Some are fated. And some are forged in pain, blood, and devotion. Disclaimer: I do not own the Vampire Diaries, Supernatural, Teen Wolf, Smallville, or The Originals. I do not own any of the characters besides Eden Parker and Ben Monroe. All rights reserved to the writers.

entry.title: A Borrowed Sky
entry.summary:
Author: 1223rhys

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 131,817Chapters: 23/23Kudos: 193

Summary: He thought he could outrun his past. After a shootout leaves his gang scattered and the law on his heels, Derek slips into another man’s life—marriage offer and all. But he didn’t expect Stiles: clever, stubborn, and heartbreakingly sincere. And when the past catches up, Derek will have to choose what kind of man he really is—the one he left behind, or the one he’s pretending to be. Marriage was part of the plan. Falling in love wasn’t.

entry.title: My Name is Derek Hale [comic]
entry.summary:
Author: Melioristicbeast

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 0Chapters: 18/?Kudos: 1,061

Summary: From the original fic this comic is an adaptation of:“What day is it?” Derek demanded. “What?” “The day! What day is today?!” Derek let Stiles go, but only so he could reach into his pocket and pull out his phone. He tapped at the home screen, and then went so perfectly still that Stiles was pretty sure this guy wasn’t human. No human could stand that still. When it was clear Derek wasn’t going to move again without some prompting, Stiles said, “It’s Wednesday.” “That’s impossible,” Derek whispered. “Not really, it comes around every seven days.” “This is impossible,” Derek said again, looking around himself, as if he was searching for something.

entry.title: Blood Of The First Wolf
entry.summary:
Author: Werewolfbuckybarnes06

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,109Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 3

Summary: Sooooo, hey everyone. Basically, I keep having the idea that Derek and Stiles have, like, super-werewolf-magic-hybrid babies (read Eli). This story centers around that concept, with a little adaptation from the lore drop we were given from Gerard about the origin of werewolves. I don't really know how to explain it, but they need the blood of the first wolf (hey, he said the title!) to protect Eli from an ancient cult wanting to bring an evil god from another dimension to earth. I hope I didn't give too much away. Hope you all enjoy.

entry.title: Where Ashes Lie
entry.summary:
Author: TendreChaos

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 146,693Chapters: 25/40Kudos: 142

Summary: Stiles has always known he was different, that there was something inside him people were afraid of.In a society where the supernatural is hunted and contained, sorcerers are stripped of their names, their freedom, and their humanity. After months of captivity behind concrete walls, Stiles manages to escape and disappears into the woods, where he finds a rebel group willing to take him in. But trust is fragile and Stiles carries a secret, a power he barely understands and cannot share.Because if they knew the truth, if they knew what Stiles really was... They wouldn’t hate the cage that once held him.They’d build a stronger one.

entry.title: you better kiss the boy right now
entry.summary:
Author: maevedarcy

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,032Chapters: 2/2Kudos: 196

Summary: That Saturday he was particularly tense for a variety of reasons, mostly to do with his final semester at college, but the woman leaving Derek's loft when he arrived put him in a terrible mood. Her jasmine perfume still lingered in the living room, even Stiles could smell it. "She was pretty," Stiles said, trying not to scrunch his nose at the smell of the woman's perfume. "Do you want her number?" -- [Or: Stiles gets high with Derek and they finally realize the level of stupid they have been for years.]
